languages.text: {n}Пристальный взгляд дознавателя еще на мгновение задерживается на Идире, а после переходит на вас.{/n} "Боюсь, что обращать внимание на подобное — моя прямая обязанность. Но отложим этот вопрос и вернемся к предыдущему. С кем имею честь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Пристальный взгляд дознавателя еще на мгновение задерживается на Идире, а после переходит на вас.{/n} "Боюсь, что обращать внимание на подобное — моя прямая обязанность. Но отложим этот вопрос и вернемся к предыдущему. С кем имею честь?"

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"
languages.original_text: {n}Пристальный взгляд дознавателя еще на мгновение задерживается на Идире, а после переходит на вас.{/n} "Боюсь, что обращать внимание на подобное — моя прямая обязанность. Но отложим этот вопрос и вернемся к предыдущему. С кем имею честь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

{n}The interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

{n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

{n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

{n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

languages.text: {n}审讯官的目光停留在了伊迪拉身上。片刻之后，他将目光移到了你身上。{/n}“恐怕在意这种事情正是我的职责所在。不过，这件事情我们可以先搁置一下，先回到目前的要务上吧。不知我有幸与何人交谈呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}审讯官的目光停留在了伊迪拉身上。片刻之后，他将目光移到了你身上。{/n}“恐怕在意这种事情正是我的职责所在。不过，这件事情我们可以先搁置一下，先回到目前的要务上吧。不知我有幸与何人交谈呢？”

languages.text: {n}El interrogador posa su intensa mirada sobre Idira durante un momento más antes de fijarla en ti.{/n} «Me temo que prestar atención a estas cosas es mi deber expreso, pero dejemos eso a un lado por ahora y volvamos a lo que nos ocupa. ¿Con quién tengo el honor de hablar?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador posa su intensa mirada sobre Idira durante un momento más antes de fijarla en ti.{/n} «Me temo que prestar atención a estas cosas es mi deber expreso, pero dejemos eso a un lado por ahora y volvamos a lo que nos ocupa. ¿Con quién tengo el honor de hablar?».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは意味深な眼差しをしばらくイディラに向けていたが、あなたに視線を移す。{/n}「申し訳ありませんが、こうしたことを気にするのが我の特別な聖務なのです。ですが、とりあえずは保留にして目の前の本題に戻りましょう。お話しさせていただいているのはどちら様で？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは意味深な眼差しをしばらくイディラに向けていたが、あなたに視線を移す。{/n}「申し訳ないが、こうしたことを気にするのが私の特別な聖務でな。だが、とりあえずは保留にして目の前の本題に戻ろうか。光栄にも話をさせていただける相手はどちらに？」

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur continue à observer Idira pendant quelques instants, puis il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'ai bien peur de devoir faire attention à ce genre de choses, justement. Mais oublions tout ça pour le moment et revenons à la question qui nous préoccupe. À qui ai-je l'honneur de parler ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur continue à observer Idira pendant quelques instants, puis il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'ai bien peur de devoir faire attention à ce genre de choses, justement. Mais oublions tout ça pour le moment et revenons à la question qui nous préoccupe. À qui ai-je l'honneur de parler ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator mustert Idira noch etwas länger und wendet sich dann dir zu.{/n} "Ich fürchte, so etwas zu beachten, gehört zu meinen ausdrücklichen Pflichten. Aber vergessen wir das für den Moment, und widmen wir uns der aktuellen Frage. Mit wem habe ich die Ehre?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator mustert Idira noch etwas länger und wendet sich dann dir zu.{/n} "Ich fürchte, so etwas zu beachten, gehört zu meinen ausdrücklichen Pflichten. Aber vergessen wir das für den Moment, und widmen wir uns der aktuellen Frage. Mit wem habe ich die Ehre?"

languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, dik bakışlarını bir süre daha İdira'da tutup sonrasında sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Maalesef bu tür şeylere aldırış etmek öncelikli vazifemdir. Lakin şimdilik bunu bir kenara bırakıp konumuza dönelim. Kiminle konuşma şerefine nail oluyorum?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator rests his intent gaze on Idira for another moment before shifting it to you.{/n} "I'm afraid paying attention to such things is my express duty. But let's leave that aside for now and return to the issue at hand. With whom do I have the honour of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, dik bakışlarını bir süre daha İdira'da tutup sonrasında sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Maalesef bu tür şeylere aldırış etmek öncelikli vazifemdir. Lakin şimdilik bunu bir kenara bırakıp konumuza dönelim. Kiminle konuşma şerefine nail oluyorum?"
